description: HP USB flash drive offers the ultimate mobile storage solution for people on the move. An amazing of storage space for all your essential and valuable data. If you've never used a flash drive before, you will be amazed at the freedom and versatility. Empower yourself today. This amazing, portable HP USB flash drive will revolutionize the way you work and play. Want to share a new tune or pictures with your friends and family. Need to do a presentation and take file with you. Simply copy the file onto the USB and take it with you. To access your data, simply plug the USB into virtually any PC or MAC without the need for bulky cables or adapters. Show your friends and co-workers how resourceful and flexible data sharing can be by accessing your files whenever and wherever you want.
title: HP v165 4 GB USB Flash Drive P-FD4GBHP165-AZ
